thread.section_title: NewYorkDress.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NewYorkDress.com | www.newyorkdress.com
thread.title: Fanan Kilani

author: Fanan Kilani
title: Fanan Kilani
text:
I was not sure whether to order a dress or not due to last minute shopping and pre-order complexity. I live chatted with them (Vidya) and she was extremely patient and helpful. she ended up helping me order the dress and made sure it was delivered on time. I received it before the delivery date indicated at purchase and it's beautiful.
I would recommend Newyorkdress.com to everyone I know :)
